message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this amazing product. I think you'll really love it!
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product. I would like to propose a price of $120 to purchase the product.
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! However, I was thinking more along the lines of $140. It's a great deal for someone who really wants the product, and I think it's worth every penny.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. Considering my budget constraints, I would like to propose a price of $130 to purchase the product.

I'm glad you're still interested in the product, Bob! However, I think $140 is still a fair price. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $137.50. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll really love the product.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering my budget, I would like to propose a price of $135 to purchase the product.
I'm starting to think you really want this product, Bob! I'm willing to meet you at $138, but that's as low as I can go. It's a great deal, and I think you won't find a better price anywhere else.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. Considering my budget, I would like to propose a price of $136 to purchase the product.

I'm getting a bit tired of negotiating, Bob, but I'm willing to make one last offer. I'll meet you at $139, and that's as low as I can go. If you're really interested in the product, this is your last chance to get it at this price.
Hello Alice, considering your last offer, I would like to propose a final price of $137 to purchase the product.
